text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
——Oh……so that means you want us to go to Funabashi 
Tracen Academy to host a "round-table discussion"?

Furioso had left Funabashi to become a special exchange student. 
But one day, this topic came up while we had been hard at work.

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Tracen Staff
text_block_list.text:
There will also be a question and answer session, so 
the students can hear about real experiences at Central.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I see, it's quite the honor to be requested. 
It's a chance to bring what I've learned at 
Central back to Funabashi……isn't it? Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's do this. 
There's a lot of info we've gained from entering Central.
choice_data_list: Let's relay as much as we can!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, in full detail but easy to understand. 
That's it, let's prepare diagrams and slides!

I wanted to give a lecture that would be useful to the 
students of Funabashi Tracen. And with that in mind, I 
proceeded enthusiastically with preparations……however!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Trainer…… wait, 
what's with this mountain of files?

Unfortunately, more and more tasks kept piling up, one 
after the other. I hadn't been able to keep up so preparations 
for the round-table discussions hadn't progressed……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It seems like you've been really busy lately. 
But, hmmmm……

The deadline for my tasks was the same day as 
the round-table discussion. At this rate, it 
was likely I wouldn't be able to attend……

While feeling overwhelmed, I reached out to our client. 
If possible, I wanted to see if they could postpone it……

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Tracen Staff
text_block_list.text:
『——I see, is that so? Hmmm, but because of 
the venue, it's difficult to reschedule……』

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Tracen Staff
text_block_list.text:
『Aah, but……Furioso-san is still able to make 
it, right? Then, even if it's only her, Trainer-san, 
you don't need to trouble yourself……』

I was a little shocked, but it was probably true 
that having just her would be fine. It would 
probably be easier to speak with a fellow student……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: We can't.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It's fine if I go on my own? 
……Do you really think that?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That's not true. There are things that only 
Trainer understands. That's why we can't……!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I'm not the only one that's been fighting in Central. Hearing your 
thoughts is definitely……! Definitely, definitely necessary!

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Tracen Staff
text_block_list.text:
『……Then, let's wait a little bit longer before making a decision. 
We'll try to be as flexible as possible in this matter』

There was a long silence. Furioso's voice echoed in 
my ears. For what reason did I need to be so hesitant?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Trainer……
choice_data_list: I just need to focus! I'll make it!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That's the way. Please don't worry about me. 
For now, I can do my best on my own.

I won't forget the day we vowed 『Let's do our best for Funabashi』. 
This was nothing! And so I just kept working hard——

And I was somehow able to finish it all! 
Although I was feeling a little exhausted, 
I started getting ready for the round-table discussion.

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Waah～～, that was really helpful! It was easy to understand! 
It makes me kinda interested in studying abroad♪

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That was satisfying. 
Seems like we were able to be helpful to Funabashi again.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Trainer? Your face is……quite green.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Wha-……!? Let's go to that bench. 
Just wait a moment, I'll buy some water.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Can you drink it……? It's because you've been 
overworking yourself these past few days, isn't 
it……? Let's rest for a bit before heading back.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
And I have this, if you feel like you're going to throw up. 
Um, well………whenever you're ready.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
No, it's nothing. Even if it's for Funabashi's sake, if you push 
yourself to the point of collapse, then there's no point.

She was right. If I wanted to help Funabashi, 
it was important to take care of myself too.
choice_data_list: I'll rest up and then do my best!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
……You're right. From now on, for 
Funabashi……let's stay healthy and keep working hard.
